3.10.22  8:03 pm   What should you do if the people around you tell you to give up on your biggest passion (music) because you annoy everyone around you with it? Normally, I wouldn't be so easy to give up, but after years and years it starts to seem true. I love music though, I'm not sure I even could give it up. Should I just keep it to myself instead? Sorry if you've answered this before, have a good day!

3.10.22  7:35 pm   I have just listened to "Fly Around" for the first time and it left me dancing around while crying at the same time. Bill your music is helping me understand who I am as an artist. My question: if there is something I've made that I don't like, should I just toss it and shift focus to something else I do like or should I challenge myself to turn it into something I do like?
